name: 羽賀
message: "...You know you can always come back to visit."
I look at Mr. Haga, astonished by what he said.

name: 羽賀
message: "You're wondering what to do, aren't you? I'm sure you're thinking about Ms. Tae, too."

name: 羽賀
message: "But she'll be alright. It's not like you'll never see each other again. Plus, we have video calls."

name: 羽賀
message: "And we'll all be here for her too. I'm sure Ms. Tae will understand."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Mr. Haga..."

name: 羽賀
message: "Now, I don't know the exact nature of your relationship, but he must be very important to you if you're considering this."

name: 羽賀
message: "In which case, I think you should listen to your heart."

name: 羽賀
message: "I'm sure that's what Ms. Tae would want too."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Yeah."

name: キオ
message: "But you're a boy! Aren't you?!"
Kio points a finger at Noiz, who raises an eyebrow in answer.

name: ノイズ
message: "Do I look like a girl to you?"

name: キオ
message: "No! But you're a boy! And you like Aoba!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Right."

name: キオ
message: "Pervert!"

name: ナオ
message: "Peeeervert!"

name: ノイズ
message: "What's the big deal? Besides, I'd like Aoba even if he wasn't a boy."
Don't say shit like that to little kids!
Kio shuts up and thinks for a second before pointing at Noiz again.

name: キオ
message: "Alright! Can't do anything about that! You better take good care of him, though! Aoba's a real idiot!"

name: ナオ
message: "Yeah! He's really stupid!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "You little...! Where do you get off calling me an idiot?! ...Wait. Where did Mio go?"

name: 羽賀
message: "When the young man entered, she turned bright red and fled the store."
She ran away?
Wait...
Noiz did give her a kiss on the hand that one time. Maybe that really traumatized her... I mean, he's several times her size.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?"

name: キオ
message: "Mio!"
The door opens and Mio charges back into the shop.

name: ミオ
message: "Hey, you! Here!"
Mio stops in front of Noiz, red all the way out to her ears, and holds something out to him, glaring.
It's a crumpled envelope.

name: ノイズ
message: "A letter?"

name: ミオ
message: "What are you, stupid? Make sure you read it!"
Noiz takes the envelope. Mio crosses her arms and looks away.
What is it? A challenge to a duel or something?
I lean over to get a look at the letter.
The words "luv letter" are scrawled across the pink envelope in red crayon.

name: 羽賀
message: "Oh my, what's this?"
...I feel a grin coming on.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Oh-ho, we've got a real Casanova here..."
Unsurprisingly, Noiz is a little flustered. Now that's a new and interesting sight.
But he politely takes the letter and tucks it into his jacket pocket.
Then, he crouches down in front of Mio and looks her in the eye.

name: ノイズ
message: "Hey."

name: ミオ
message: "What?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Thank you."
He pats her on the head.

name: ミオ
message: "D-Don't get the wrong idea! It's not like I want you to read it or anything!"

name: キオ
message: "Hey!"
The brothers rush over and stand in front of Mio, holding out their arms.

name: キオ
message: "We don't care what you do with Aoba, but we're not letting you have our sister!"

name: ナオ
message: "No way!"

name: キオ
message: "You'll have to go through us first!"

name: ナオ
message: "Yeah!"

name: ミオ
message: "You guys are so stupid!"

name: ノイズ
message: "You don't need to worry."
